name: Sandwich on a Stick
description: Assemble a fun sandwich on a stick—it’s a guaranteed way to get them eating their lunch! Include a creamy dip like 3 Onion or Lemon Dilly.

ingredients.name: CCB Dip Mix or Creamy Ranch Dip Mix

preparation: In a small bowl, combine softened cream cheese and dip mix. Spread over two of the bread slices and top each slice with another slice to make a sandwich. Slice each sandwich into 1" cubes.
Slice cucumber into rounds. Cut cheese into 1⁄2" cubes; you should have about 1⁄2 cup. Fold deli meat into quarters.
Thread sandwich cubes, cucumber rounds, cheese cubes, folded deli meat, and tomatoes evenly between eight small wooden skewers.
tips: Use small cookie cutters to cut your bread, cheese, and veggies into fun shapes.
Use this recipe as a guide for any type of sandwich, like a classic PB&J served with fruit or a deconstructed club sandwich.
Swap cubed bread for pita wedges.
